title: Are there any instances of all 10 players in a game being banned?
body:
I don't know if this is the right board, but it can't hurt.
I was just wondering if all 10 players in a single 5v5 game were banned due to that game?
Anybody know for certain if this has/hasn't happened?

replies.body: I have had my entire 5 man premade banned, I lost 1k on that account all over what is now my EX friend who reported us joking around, we all said a lot of bad things during that match but we were all real life friends and not one thing was said in all chat haha god I’m still mad about this $1000 usd even more I spent over the years on that account gone because me and 4 of my real life friends used game chat. We tried fighting it but riot games dose not give a shit period they don’t care one tiny bit about the fact we were a 5 man premade and just joking and messing around with each other.

Well it's not impossible, but I doubt it's ever happened. The vast majority of players never see any form of punishment, getting enough salt lords together in a game with behaviour severe enough to warrant a ban would be statistically speaking *highly* improbable unless they were trying to do it on purpose.

I don't believe so. If there is, it's gonna be really hard to find it.

Maybe 2 - 3 players at the same time, but aside from that, again it's very rare.
